title: Why does Jinx get 3 more emotes? She already have 2. Why not make something for other champs?
body:
So Jinx already have 2 emotes
[From Jinx, With Love](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/f/fd/From_Jinx%2C_With_Love_Emote.png/revision/latest?cb=20180224191507)
[Catch Me If You Can!](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/e/e4/Catch_Me_If_You_Can%21_Emote.png/revision/latest?cb=20171120233401)

and now there are 3 more being added of her
[Aww Yiss](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/1/1a/Aww_Yiss_Emote.png/revision/latest?cb=20180731211655)
[Wahaha](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/7/7d/Wahaha_Emote.png/revision/latest?cb=20180731211711)
[So Lame](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/f/f5/So_Lame_Emote.png/revision/latest?cb=20180731211732)

Plus Wiki list another one that I haven't seen before. It doesn't seem to be in game, but rather made but not released
[Teary Eyes](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/0/0c/Teary_Eyes_Emote.png/revision/latest?cb=20171221065220)

So why will Jinx have 6 emotes total? So far champions had only 1 emote (or in very rare cases 2) if any. Most champions don't have n emote that shows them at all. 

There were really amazing ideas in memotion contest for less popular champs. Plus there was a guy that made 45 really creative emotes that a lot of people would love to see. https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/KJI2f1eh-made-45-emotes-in-celebration-of-the-launch-of-patch-720
So I doubt Riot lacks ideas. 

Do they make emotes based on champion popularity? If so thay have to stop. These are not skins, if certain emote is good enough people will buy and use it. Do you know what emotes I see a lot? Rammus, Amumu, Naut. They are not polular champions but people just like them. These 3 new Jinx ones lacks something, they are very generic in my opinion.

I'm ok with expressions showed on these 3 new emotes, but couldn't there be other champions that represent them?

replies.body: She is the Harley Quinn of the League. No need to tell how DC popularizes the fuck of Harley Quinn right now.

She's actually the Joker. Look at her skin. Look at her gadgets. Look at her vendetta with pissing off Vi (League's gruffest detective).


And then there's her name etymology...
Jinx as a verb means to curse, or to bring bad luck; to cast a hex or spell on.
Joker as a noun means a person who is fond of joking, prankster; one who makes fun of others for personal enjoyment.

Both start with J.

Let's also not forget that Harley was introduced into the Batman The Animated Cartoon Series as a temporary side character who was specifically so that the joker could be Harely's Love interest, where as Joker doesn't care for that sort of thing (hint hint, Jinx doesn't care for that sort of thing)

She has "Joker" written all over her. Joker is the best Villain. She may have some of Harley's physical characteristics, ... female body...

but she has all of the Joker's personality and flare, right down to her 4th wall breaks.

And she kinda has an explosive temper, I imagine.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 



Oh yeah, one last thing. She wears a heck of a lot of purple in her outfit.
https://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Jinx_0.jpg
See what I mean?

> She's actually the Joker. Look at her skin. Look at her gadgets. Look at her vendetta with pissing off Vi (League's gruffest detective).
And then there's her name etymology...
Jinx as a verb means to curse, or to bring bad luck; to cast a hex or spell on.
Joker as a noun means a person who is fond of joking, prankster; one who makes fun of others for personal enjoyment.
> She has "Joker" written all over her. Joker is the best Villain. She may have some of Harley's physical characteristics, ... female body...

Well, that too, but she has that "cute and crazy vibe" which makes her likeable and removes all of the Joker's creepiness. Same with Harley who does like 99% of bad stuff Joker does, but "omg, she is cute and funny".  

To me, the one and only female version of Joker is this: 

http://menteymanos.com/images/who-is-the-joker-in-the-comics/who-is-the-joker-in-the-comics-1.jpg
is that batman's mom from the flash point paradox?
Yup.

champ favoritism
Money favoritism, ppl buy Jinx emotes and not Yorick emotes it seems.
Of course no one brought a Yorick emote. A Yorick emote doesn't exist yet.

Yeah. Pretty much.

Every champion should recieve at least one emote, one icon, and one Chroma set.

It is one of the contributing factors of fighting games to have color schematics available for personalization.

From King of Fighters, to Super Smash Brothers series....

You would win so much!
Didn't they give that penguin from snowday bard skin like 10 emotes?
To be fair most of those emotes don't fit on most champs. Like any of them dabbing would be really out of character.
Despite the fact that she has no actual likeable qualities and most people would be terrified of her or assume she's a junkie, she's popular. Quite frankly, I'm surprised Ahri only has one right now.

> [{quoted}](name=Ionian Vulpix,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lXszOMdb,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-08-01T13:55:21.134+0000)
>
> she has no actual likeable qualities

Not as a person, but she's definitely likable as a character. Most people find crazies entertaining.

I hate chaos for the sake of chaos (Chaotic Neutral?). It is just one of the most unlikeable character traits because they just have nothing else behind them or any reason for it.

Doesn't help that I absolutely hate playing against the queen of popping off.
Yeah, and it really sucks for people that actually *dislike* her, cuz then I gotta deal with seeing her everywhere

Now I don't mean to be mean to all the other champions released, but I don't think you guys realize the big picture here as not everyone was around when she was released.

I remember {{champion:222}}  was one of the most hyped champion releases and even got a music video to help hype her release. In fact she was probably the champion that hyped me the most in this game and I have been playing since just after Lucian was released. She represents the era that a lot of players started to get invested into the game. It's simply marketing. They are feeding off the connection she built when she was released. Those of us who were there for it hold a special place for Jinx in our hearts no matter how unbalanced she can be because she represents the good times in league and quite often she also fits the player base in emotion range.

Let's put it this way: I am more hyped nowadays for champion reworks to old binary champions than to see new ones. I feel more of an "Ooooh that's a cool rework" and more of a "Yet another champion that's super overloaded or a pain in the ass to balance and isn't very likable". The only champion as of lately that I can say I drew any kind of enjoyment for seeing being made was {{champion:240}} because man he has some great personality and his connection with Skarl in his voice lines.

Maybe it's just me liking crazy champions because quite honestly they feel the most entertaining to me.

My list of champs I hated to see be made: {{champion:164}} {{champion:555}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:145}} {{champion:3}} (I know he was reworked but the rework theme is just so bad compared to the original)
Where the hell is my damn Skarner and Malphite emotes?
Lmao no one is gonna buy these emotes and we know it

Honestly I think that this forums have a bad influence on me, like, on games I never flame and I'm super positive and here I'm the personification of salt that hates not only these forums as a whole and want to remove the Gameplay Boards.
I feel like riot forces favoritism on players. But this is sadly the truth :(
Jinx is The Joker?! What about Shaco? D: He is 100% League's Joker. :(
sorta agree here if it wasn't for the fact that her lore is more in-line with that of the Jokers.

Because she actually has character and personality instead of boobs.

But really, Jinx probably is the most expressive champion riot has, that gives her a much broader scope of possible emotes.

a much broader scope of possible emotes, so they decide to use that scope and give her; confident/happy, crying/laughing, and bored.

not that these are bad, like you said, jinx has a wide range of feelings that she can switch around through very quickly, so it does generally make sense, but these are emotions that seem to be felt and expressed to some degree by most people that i've known in my life and interacted with. (besides, some of the more out-of-character emotes could be a lot of fun, i'd think) in the end, it's really not a big deal, but i agree with the original post in the fact that it seems a bit odd to give jinx so many in comparison to others right now.

Wukong only has one, and it was a bundle exclusive...
Lame. I need a crying Skarner emote. Then we'll be gucci.
At the very least, they should've all been in different skins instead of just giving her 4 emotes in her base skin.

She's quite literally the most popular NA champ alongside Jhin and Ekko

Source: A Rioter in a Hotline League interview

I'm not surprised.
I'm sure they will bring out skin + emote from Ahri soon.

> [{quoted}](name=Salvor Hardın,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lXszOMdb,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-08-01T12:11:24.711+0000)
>
> I'm not surprised.
> I'm sure they will bring out skin + emote from Ahri soon.

Jinx is far more favortized than Ahri.
There isn't a single emote from {{champion:82}} {{champion:432}} or even {{champion:240}}

If you look at it from a character perspective she has plenty of emotions to display compared to champs like {{champion:432}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:268}} aside from the occasional crescent eyes = happy face motif.
But emotes often break champion characetr and show him in a way that you don't see everyday. I've seen great emotes for all of these champion you listed in memotion contest

As wayward son said, its likely more for who the emotion fits with. Popularity definitely would be a part of it, but i can't see them give like a random smiling emote to every champ when it jives with a lot of their personality.

Jinx has a chaotic personality that gives well to many emotions. 

While I welcome anything Jinx, I do hope to see a few more pun emotes for less popular  champs. Like the Naut bad one.

I think the scarriest thing is Naut would have probably one of the most toxic ones possible for your own team. Most of the emotes are geared at emotions of yourself and the enemy team. Naut could possibly have an emote thats literally just an anchor symbolizing your team being heavy.
